title: Array Reversal
statement:
# Array Reversal

Write a program to reverse an array of integers.

## Problem Description

Given an array of N integers, print the array in reverse order.

## Input Format

First line: integer N (size of array)
Second line: N space-separated integers

## Output Format

N space-separated integers in reverse order.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 10^5
- -10^9 ≤ each element ≤ 10^9
